name: Hyper Lava Death Squad (Beta)
description:
Hyper Lava Death Squad is a hectic and explosive shooter where the only way to win is to knock your opponents into the lava. You and your AI team face off against other mercenary teams to see who's the best in the galaxy, testing your agility, focus, and multitasking abilities.

  • Battle cutthroat, unrelenting AI
  • Control yourself and your rockets simultaneously
  • Upgrade your stats
  • Unlock new armor
  • Lead your AI squadmates to victory
  • Rank up the leaderboards

The game is currently in development, (estimated release in mid summer 2018) but the current beta test is available for download. Thanks for playing, and any feedback is appreciated!

Follow for development updates on Twitter
